title: Teapot and Creamer, from a from a Child's Tea Set
description: light blue with brown stems, leaves and rims; flowers have been hand painted; crafted in light weight pottery; teapot cover is recessed with a steam hole in the center of the finial; cream pitcher has a wide lip; sugar bowl fits over the base; waste bowl is large
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
